DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate immunogenicity safety GSK Biologicals ' investigational vaccine GSK2340272A .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Immunogenicity Safety Investigational Influenza Vaccine ( H1N1 ) Adults
